content.processed:
Recommendations

Whether you prefer to spend the New Year's Eve at home with friends watching your favourite TV show or at your mounatin cottage, it is important to be careful and prevent communal spread.

The specific measures that will apply in the future are not yet known. However, the measures currently in force do not allow (e.g) holiday rentals, so we recommend that you wait a while before booking your stay.
